You can too!

About

Hey there! My name is Jessa and I have been working through the three.js journey taught by Bruno Simon (he's a wonderful teacher). I hope it inspires you to get creative!

Take some time to interact with this page. As you scroll down the page, you will notice the 3D object reacting by spinning a little faster. They also react to your mouse movements. You can also use the controls at the top to change the metalness and roughness of the objects. Have fun!

For this project, I combined what I learned from the "Materials" and "Scroll Based Animation" lessons. I used an environment map for the 3D objects. The image used for the environment map was provided by Bruno Simons. It came from HDRIHaven, which is a great resource providing free images under CC0 license.

Thank you for stopping by :)
